title: Public utilities and services like information centre, tourist reception centre, telephone booths, f
clause_text: Public utilities and services like information centre, tourist reception centre, telephone booths, first aid centre, health farm, gymnasium , indoor game hall and lawn tennis court, structures for recreation purposes such as Amusement Park, water sports facilities, marine jitties & pontoons for docking of boats, swimming pools, boat house, and like, with following restrictions - Minimum plot size should be 100 m. x 50 m. irrespective of holdings.
